name: Tempest
blurb: Help us raise The Tempest in Yorktown!

name: EARSHOT, an audio play and theatrical sound installation
blurb: Explore a bar full of hidden dramas, featuring 12 original audio plays with 28 characters that interact in unexpected ways.

name: Heroine: a Female Soldier's Story
blurb: This play chronicles the true story of a US army survivor of military sexual trauma. STRETCH GOAL 11K, 45 MINS TO GO!

name: Houseworld
blurb: A new immersive theater performance in which 30 guests enter a mansion, one by one, and step into a lucid dream.

name: The Grand Paradise
blurb: An immersive theater experience. A late 1970s tropical resort. A fountain of youth that promises to quench your deepest longings.

name: Then She Fell
blurb: An immersive theater experience combining a former hospital space, the writings of Lewis Carroll, & just 15 audience members per show.

name: Seen / By Everyone, a new play about living (& dying) online
blurb: A theatrical mashup of the uniquely 21st century experience of mourning and moving on in the digital age.

name: Sweet & Lucky
blurb: An immersive theatre experience. A speakeasy antique shop.     A labyrinth of devotion, passion, and remembrance.

name: Event Horizon Larp
blurb: A galaxy on the edge of chaos. A new colony on a strange planet. Welcome to Event Horizon, a live action role play coming April 2017.

name: JIB // a new rock musical, album, and film
blurb: LIVING FILM+ROCK SHOW+GHOST PLAY. songs: AMANDA PALMER & JASON WEBLEY. words/music/direction: MICHAEL McQUILKEN. production: OSR & TWF

name: NEVERMORE METRO Immersive Arts Festival
blurb: Help create the first ever haunted Valley bus ride!

name: House 7A: A Haunted Encounter
blurb: House 7A is a free, intimate & interactive haunted house experience taking place on Governors Island every Sat & Sun in September.

name: Cutting Edge Magic Show
blurb: I'm creating a magic stage show with graphic effects projected on a high-tech invisible screen.

name: Waking La Llorona
blurb: A multisensory immersive experience inspired by one of Mexico's most legendary tales.

name: "Coming Clean: Life As A Naked House Cleaner" UK & USA Tour!
blurb: After 25 shows in London, my 5-star solo show "Coming Clean: Life As A Naked House Cleaner" is ready for a UK & USA 2018 tour!

name: We're building a venue for our immersive family theatre!
blurb: Our very own venue takes our improvised show, Almost Always Muddy, into the hearts of communities who don't have access to the arts.

name: Forward Flux presents A Small History of Amal, Age 7
blurb: An immersive production of A SMALL HISTORY OF AMAL, AGE 7, by Lindsay Joelle. In partnership with Pratidhwani.

name: The Mortality Machine
blurb: An immersive theatre event where YOU are the protagonist.

name: Through the Wren
blurb: An immersive theatre experience where 12 guests journey in and out of a parallel world set in a mid-1840’s Gothic Romance Fairytale.

name: WHAT TO SEND UP WHEN IT GOES DOWN
blurb: A whirlwind performance, play, and celebration by Aleshea Harris.  How will you send up the ones we've lost?

name: The Nest
blurb: Equipped with a flickering flashlight, explore the mysterious storage room of a woman to uncover her story. An immersive experience.

name: THE WHY
blurb: THE WHY is a new immersive experience in Los Angeles. This four-part series explores what we believe and WHY we believe it!

name: Murder on the 10:16
blurb: A live action twist on a classic Murder Mystery, backers will become suspects on a heritage steam train destined for horror!

name: Remembrance
blurb: Step inside the mind of a woman living with Alzheimer’s

name: 'BLACKOUT' Immersive Halloween Show
blurb: Provide direct support for the payment of actors in an immersive horror theater project designed for guests to walk through alone.

name: Help Dan Chan acquire a new illusion
blurb: Acquiring an illusion, the initial step of many steps in moving toward "The Magic Mansion" - a private club & hybrid venue for magic

name: Real Royalty 2024
blurb: Journey deep into a tangled world of dark and twisted fairy tales in our immersive-theater experience.
